Question: In the movie 'The Wrestler' (2008), which of the following statements about the cast are true?
Options:
A. Ernest Miller portrayed the character Bob / 'The Ayatollah'.
B. Mickey Rourke played the lead role of Randy 'The Ram' Robinson.
C. Marisa Tomei appeared as a stripper named Cassidy.
D. Darren Aronofsky directed the film.
Answer: Ernest Miller portrayed the character Bob / 'The Ayatollah'.; Mickey Rourke played the lead role of Randy 'The Ram' Robinson.; Marisa Tomei appeared as a stripper named Cassidy.; Darren Aronofsky directed the film.
